price: 3. Puede que te consumas de pesar (¡oh, Muhammad!) porque (los habitantes de La Meca) no creen.
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
